title: Magic Snow Elements
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of Magic Snow Elements! 

This package contains 17 Magic Snow Elements sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/oDkt_VnGv3g


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 24 FPS


Texture Resolutions:

● Snow 01_2048 × 1440

● Snow 02_2048 × 1440

● Snow 03_3072 × 2304

● Snow 04_2048 × 1728

● Snow 05_2560 × 2016

● Snow 06_3072 × 2016

● Snow 07_2560 × 2016

● Snow 08_2560 × 2016

● Snow 09_2560 × 1728

● Snow 10_3584 × 2304

● Snow 11_2560 × 1728

● Snow 12_3072 × 2016

● Snow 13_2048 × 1728

● Snow 14_2048 × 1728

● Snow 15_1536 × 1440

● Snow 16_2048 × 1728

● Snow 17_1536 × 1152


Number of Textures: 17

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
